::Dollen::

"Hmm. Try your larger on board weapons. If you got nukes, shoot them at
Megs."

::Hot Rod::

He used his optics to shoot the flying saw down.
"This sin't getting us anywhere."
He karate kicks at Sharpedge's head.
"But its fun!"
